languages.text: "Бессмысленно описывать Чудотворный Реактор Синтеза. Лишь узрев его ярящуюся мощь, можно постичь его благословенную суть и устрашиться всемогущества Омниссии. Его ядро было обретено четыре тысячи лет назад и доставлено на Райкад Минорис в походе святого подвижника Локк-Импульса I. Ни на мгновение не угасала его священная искра, а стены и силовые установки сей обители были возведены вокруг реликвии, дабы уберечь ее от несведущих мирян, а их — от ее потрясающей мощи".

"It would be pointless to describe the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. Only through beholding its ferocious power can one comprehend its blessed essence, and fear the might of the Omnissiah. Its core was found four thousand years ago and delivered to Rykad Minoris by the holy warrior of faith Locke-Impulse I during one of his campaigns. Its sacred spark has not gone out for an instant, and the walls and power units of this cenobium have been erected around the relic in order to protect it from ignorant laypeople, as well as protect them from its formidable might."
languages.original_text: "Бессмысленно описывать Чудотворный Реактор Синтеза. Лишь узрев его ярящуюся мощь, можно постичь его благословенную суть и устрашиться всемогущества Омниссии. Его ядро было обретено четыре тысячи лет назад и доставлено на Райкад Минорис в походе святого подвижника Локк-Импульса I. languages.text: "Es wäre zwecklos, den Wundersamen Fusionsreaktor zu beschreiben. Nur, indem man seine wilde Kraft selbst sieht, kann man seine gesegnete Essenz begreifen und die Macht des Omnissiah fürchten. Der heilige Glaubenskrieger Locke-Impulse I hat seinen Kern vor viertausend Jahren während eines seiner Kreuzzüge gefunden und nach Rykad Minoris gebracht. Sein heiliger Funke ist noch nie auch nur für einen kurzen Augenblick erloschen. Die Wände und Energieeinheiten dieses Cenobiums wurden um das Relikt herum errichtet, um es vor ignoranten Laien zu schützen und umgekehrt sie vor seiner formidablen Macht zu schützen."
languages.original_text: "It would be pointless to describe the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. Only through beholding its ferocious power can one comprehend its blessed essence, and fear the might of the Omnissiah. Its core was found four thousand years ago and delivered to Rykad Minoris by the holy warrior of faith Locke-Impulse I during one of his campaigns. Its sacred spark has not gone out for an instant, and the walls and power units of this cenobium have been erected around the relic in order to protect it from ignorant laypeople, as well as protect them from its formidable might."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre zwecklos, den Wundersamen Fusionsreaktor zu beschreiben. Nur, indem man seine wilde Kraft selbst sieht, kann man seine gesegnete Essenz begreifen und die Macht des Omnissiah fürchten. Der heilige Glaubenskrieger Locke-Impulse I hat seinen Kern vor viertausend Jahren während eines seiner Kreuzzüge gefunden und nach Rykad Minoris gebracht. Sein heiliger Funke ist noch nie auch nur für einen kurzen Augenblick erloschen. Die Wände und Energieeinheiten dieses Cenobiums wurden um das Relikt herum errichtet, um es vor ignoranten Laien zu schützen und umgekehrt sie vor seiner formidablen Macht zu schützen."

languages.text: « Il serait inutile de décrire ce qu'est le réacteur à fusion miraculeux. Ce n'est qu'en contemplant sa puissance féroce que l'on peut comprendre son essence bénie et craindre la puissance de l'Omnimessie. Son cœur a été découvert il y a quatre mille ans par Locke-Impulsion I, un guerrier de la foi, qui l'a amené sur Rykad Minoris lors de l'une de ses campagnes. Son étincelle sacrée ne s'est jamais éteinte. Les murs et les unités d'alimentation de ce Cenobium ont été érigés autour de la relique afin de la protéger des profanes... et pour les protéger, eux, de son incroyable puissance. »
languages.original_text: "It would be pointless to describe the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. Only through beholding its ferocious power can one comprehend its blessed essence, and fear the might of the Omnissiah. Its core was found four thousand years ago and delivered to Rykad Minoris by the holy warrior of faith Locke-Impulse I during one of his campaigns. Its sacred spark has not gone out for an instant, and the walls and power units of this cenobium have been erected around the relic in order to protect it from ignorant laypeople, as well as protect them from its formidable might."

traits.locale_text: « Il serait inutile de décrire ce qu'est le réacteur à fusion miraculeux. Ce n'est qu'en contemplant sa puissance féroce que l'on peut comprendre son essence bénie et craindre la puissance de l'Omnimessie. Son cœur a été découvert il y a quatre mille ans par Locke-Impulsion I, un guerrier de la foi, qui l'a amené sur Rykad Minoris lors de l'une de ses campagnes. Son étincelle sacrée ne s'est jamais éteinte. Les murs et les unités d'alimentation de ce Cenobium ont été érigés autour de la relique afin de la protéger des profanes... et pour les protéger, eux, de son incroyable puissance. »

languages.text: “用言语来描述神赐聚变反应堆毫无意义。只有亲眼见过它的凶猛力量，才能理解它的神圣本质，对欧姆尼塞亚心怀畏惧。它的核心是在四千年前发现的。在某场战役中，圣洁的信仰斗士洛克脉冲一号把它献给了小莱卡德。反应堆的神圣火花一刻都未曾熄灭过，整个修会的墙壁和动力装置，就是围绕着这件圣物建立起来的。这既可以保护它免受无知外行人的伤害，也可以保证它强大的力量不会伤害到外行人。”
languages.original_text: "It would be pointless to describe the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. Only through beholding its ferocious power can one comprehend its blessed essence, and fear the might of the Omnissiah. Its core was found four thousand years ago and delivered to Rykad Minoris by the holy warrior of faith Locke-Impulse I during one of his campaigns. Its sacred spark has not gone out for an instant, and the walls and power units of this cenobium have been erected around the relic in order to protect it from ignorant laypeople, as well as protect them from its formidable might."

traits.locale_text: “用言语来描述神赐聚变反应堆毫无意义。只有亲眼见过它的凶猛力量，才能理解它的神圣本质，对欧姆尼塞亚心怀畏惧。它的核心是在四千年前发现的。在某场战役中，圣洁的信仰斗士洛克脉冲一号把它献给了小莱卡德。反应堆的神圣火花一刻都未曾熄灭过，整个修会的墙壁和动力装置，就是围绕着这件圣物建立起来的。这既可以保护它免受无知外行人的伤害，也可以保证它强大的力量不会伤害到外行人。”

languages.text: 「奇跡のフュージョンリアクターについて説明することは無意味だろう。その獰猛なパワーを見ることによってのみ、人はその祝福された本質を理解し、万機神の力を恐れることができるのだ。そのコアは4千年前に発見され、信仰の聖戦士ロック・インパルス1世がある作戦の際にライカド・ミノリスに引き渡した。その聖なる火花は一瞬たりとも消えることはない。そしてこのセノビウムの壁とパワーユニットは、無知な大衆から遺物を守り、その強大な力から彼らを守るために、遺物の周囲に建てられたものだ」
languages.original_text: "It would be pointless to describe the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. Only through beholding its ferocious power can one comprehend its blessed essence, and fear the might of the Omnissiah. Its core was found four thousand years ago and delivered to Rykad Minoris by the holy warrior of faith Locke-Impulse I during one of his campaigns. Its sacred spark has not gone out for an instant, and the walls and power units of this cenobium have been erected around the relic in order to protect it from ignorant laypeople, as well as protect them from its formidable might."

traits.locale_text: 「奇跡のフュージョンリアクターについて説明することは無意味だろう。その獰猛なパワーを見ることによってのみ、人はその祝福された本質を理解し、万機神の力を恐れることができるのだ。そのコアは4千年前に発見され、信仰の聖戦士ロック・インパルス1世がある作戦の際にライカド・ミノリスに引き渡した。その聖なる火花は一瞬たりとも消えることはない。そしてこのセノビウムの壁とパワーユニットは、無知な大衆から遺物を守り、その強大な力から彼らを守るために、遺物の周囲に建てられたものだ」

languages.text: «Sería inútil describir el Reactor de Fusión Milagroso. Solo contemplando su feroz poder se puede comprender su bendita esencia y temer el poder del Omnissiah. Su núcleo fue encontrado hace cuatro mil años y entregado a Rykad Minoris por el guerrero sagrado de la fe Locke-Impulse I durante una de sus campañas. Su chispa sagrada no se ha apagado ni un instante, y los muros y las unidades de energía de este cenobio se han erigido alrededor de la reliquia para protegerla de los profanos ignorantes, así como para protegerlos de su formidable poder».
languages.original_text: "It would be pointless to describe the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. Only through beholding its ferocious power can one comprehend its blessed essence, and fear the might of the Omnissiah. Its core was found four thousand years ago and delivered to Rykad Minoris by the holy warrior of faith Locke-Impulse I during one of his campaigns. Its sacred spark has not gone out for an instant, and the walls and power units of this cenobium have been erected around the relic in order to protect it from ignorant laypeople, as well as protect them from its formidable might."

traits.locale_text: «Sería inútil describir el Reactor de Fusión Milagroso. Solo contemplando su feroz poder se puede comprender su bendita esencia y temer el poder del Omnissiah. Su núcleo fue encontrado hace cuatro mil años y entregado a Rykad Minoris por el guerrero sagrado de la fe Locke-Impulse I durante una de sus campañas. Su chispa sagrada no se ha apagado ni un instante, y los muros y las unidades de energía de este cenobio se han erigido alrededor de la reliquia para protegerla de los profanos ignorantes, así como para protegerlos de su formidable poder».

languages.text: "Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'nü tanımlamak manasız olur. Yalnızca dizginsiz gücüne şahit olanlar onun kutsi özünü kavrayabilir ve Hermesih'in kudretinden korkarlar. Çekirdeği dört bin yıl önce bulunmuş ve kutsal inanç savaşçısı I. Locke-İmpuls tarafından seferlerinin birinde Rykad Minoris'e teslim edilmiştir. İlahi kıvılcımı bunca zamandır bir an bile olsa sönmemiştir. Hem onu cahil avamdan hem de halkı onun muazzam kudretinden koruması için yadigârın etrafına senobiyumun duvarları ve güç üniteleri dikilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "It would be pointless to describe the Miraculous Fusion Reactor. Only through beholding its ferocious power can one comprehend its blessed essence, and fear the might of the Omnissiah. Its core was found four thousand years ago and delivered to Rykad Minoris by the holy warrior of faith Locke-Impulse I during one of his campaigns. Its sacred spark has not gone out for an instant, and the walls and power units of this cenobium have been erected around the relic in order to protect it from ignorant laypeople, as well as protect them from its formidable might."

traits.locale_text: "Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'nü tanımlamaya çalışmak manasız olurdu. Yalnızca azılı gücüne şahit olanlar onun kutsanmış özünü kavrayabilirler ve Hermesih'in kudreti karşısında dehşete düşerler. Çekirdeği dört bin yıl önce bulundu ve kutsal inanç savaşçısı I. Locke-İmpulse tarafından seferlerinin birinde Rykad Minoris'e teslim edildi. İlahi kıvılcımı bunca zamandır bir an bile olsa sönmedi. Hem onu cahil avamdan koruması hem de onları onun muazzam kudretinden koruması için yadigârın etrafına senobiyumun duvarları ve güç üniteleri dikildi."
